body.description: PCI-E 4.0 Riser Cable White PCIe Riser Cable : Gen 4.0 VERTICAL GPU BRACKET KIT Vertical GPU mount accessory for the O11D MINI. Bracket Kit Dimension: D180mm X W191.5mm X H272.5mm Cable Length: 200mm Expansion Slots: 3 slots

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 317 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install but plan on losing a fan if you have a current gen GPU
reviews.reviewText: Pros:*Very easy to install in a O11 mini - literally takes 2 minutes*Thumb screws only for install*Leaves the bottom two PCIe slots open on a full size ATX mobo, which is nice*Has slots in the bottom plate for more airflow to the GPU*Overall is pretty secure and solid when installed properly, my GPU sits nice and level*GPU fans sit at least 2 inches from the side glass (and thats with a 3 slot GPU), plenty of room for cooling. I have already confirmed no change in temps for my GPU.*Bridge cable appears to be decent quality and is also flexible enough to move around a little.Cons:*If you have a current gen GPU (RTX 4000 series in particular) you are definitely going to lose the rear fan slot - look at my pic (thats an MSI gaming trio RTX 4070ti). The rear fan doesn't even come close to fitting with my GPU. I could install the fan on the outside of the case, that is actually an option and there is a slot to get the fan wires back through into the case, but I'm not sure yet if I want to do that or how it would look.*One of the tabs on the left side of the mount (that interlocks with the case) is located where the mobo I/O shield is. This shouldn't be there because it actually interferes with installation. I had to flatten it out with pliers to get it to install correctly. I guess it would install right if you put this mount in BEFORE your motherboard install, but otherwise it doesn't.*Its expensive for what it is. There are a lot of whole cases that don't cost this much. But if you have a O11 mini and you like the look, its worth having the one that is made specifically for this case.NOTE: Depending on your GPU you may have to loosen the little screws holding the PCIe port down to the bottom plate, mine was too far back and the GPU wouldn't mount up properly. For a second I thought it wasn't going to fit, but luckily the port position can be slid forward/backward by a few millimeters as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bracket but is it needed
reviews.reviewText: East to install. Very tight in this case. Notice the fan barely fit above the card. I have a 3070ti here and had to install fan after the card to make it work. Con, it’s expensive for a piece of metal that doesn’t improve performance. Looks great tho right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gen4 Riser Cable DOES Work at Gen4!
reviews.reviewText: I was relieved to find the 4.0 riser cable worked just as it should. Disappointed to find I could no longer fit a 120 fan in the rear. Pleased with the look at the adjustability of the bracket placement. You can also adjust where the riser sits on the bracket, three positions so you can move closer to the glass or to the mobo.In my case, with huge MSI Gaming X trio 6800xt, it is a tight fit still. The two tiny screws attaching the riser to the bracket can barely hold my big card in place. Provides a great look, and more support than the sag from traditional mounting. However, it hardly seems worth the price. High quality all around then a mediocre way to fasten down all that weight to the bracket was a bit of a let down.Still recommend this product, especially if you are sure you will never need to access other PCIe slots and have a lighter or shorter card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works as it should, bolts right in. Easy and straightforward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works as expected. pcie gen 4 works like it should
reviews.reviewText: While waiting to get a bigger case, I was able to get a rtx 3080. Ive been using this pcie riser/bracket combo as a way to just run the RTX 3080. I have seen full speed compatibility with my gigabyte z490 with adjustable BAR support after updating bios, configuring it properly and installing an 11th gen cpu.assuming you have a z590 or newer/ 12gen or current Ryzen platforms, I would imagine it would work out of the box no problem, and the effort I did have to take is more the fault of my "older" hardware, just make sure your settings are correct and this riser should be great. Its been running flawlessly now for 5 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Necessary for those needing/wanting to vertical mount a GPU in the o11 mini case
reviews.reviewText: Decide on vertical mounting before you put everything together!I decided later on that I wanted to vertical mount my GPU, but it turned out to be a bigger task than I thought. First of all, since this mount replaced the whole back mounting wall of the case, anything mounted to it needs to be disconnected. After installing the GPU to the mount and attempting to install it to the case, I realized there were huge interference issues with the fans at the bottom of the case. Luckily the case allowed for the mobo to be positioned higher, but that also would require a decent amount of teardown. My fan facing the backside of the case could also no longer be mounted there due to interference with the GPU.In the end, I decided it wasn't worth the effort and the loss of 1 fan. Again, strongly recommend to build with the vertical mount in mind, and not do this AFTER the build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great build quality with some issues for my use-case
reviews.reviewText: First, the build quality is right on par with the quality of the 011 mini. This replaces the entire back panel and it feels like it was built with the case after installation. The pcie 4 cable worked without bios changes with my evga rtx 3070 ftw3 and msi x570 gaming pro carbon. I have 0 sag as well with this mount.Couple things to note. With bulky cards like mine, you will no longer have access to the rear exhaust fan. Between losing that and the lose of natural heat convection mounting vertically, I did see my card go up 5c at full load from 55 to 60c. Not a huge issue as that is far below thermal throttling or excessive heat damage anyways. If you are using an air cooler for your cpu, this is not for you. Lastly, it was a huge headache getting my card properly slotted onto the mount, but i feel like thats an issue with how bulky my card is and not a fault with the mount itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth it!
reviews.reviewText: i dont like that it still kind of has a bracket/gpu sag.aesthetically, very worth it and it does keep the gpu away from that glass panel to give it optimal air flow still.

Fits my O11 mini air case, and it would fit the O11 dynamic mini aswell, you can adjust the gpu bracket 3x to fit your cpu cooler so its quite flexible. And no need to remove the MB to replace the old back panel. Easy instal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Helaas is de doos gedeukt en daardoor ook het metalen frame

Très bien pour sa carte graphique , surtout sur les founder édition ou l'air sort sur le côté , mais le problème c'est que je peux pas mettre de vis pour attacher ma carte graphique , impossible l'espace et trop grand comme montre la 3eme photos

reviews.reviewTitle: Un riser c'est joli mais au détriment des...
reviews.reviewText: Un riser c'est bien et cela permet de mettre une carte graphique à la verticale dans son pc mais si cela implique une perte de performance ou des mauvais contacts successifs alors cela en lève tout l'intérêt.Ce riser est bien en soit mais c'est toujours plus sensible que si la carte était directement connectée à la carte mère, seule solution pour ne perdre aucunes performances.Certes, la perte est limitée maintenant voir presque absente selon la qualité du riser...Ce riser, très bien fait pour le boitier LIAN LI 011D MINI permet de mettre encore un radiateur de 360mm en bas du boitier mais selon la hauteur de la carte graphique (j'ai bien dis hauteur et pas longueur), il peut empêcher de placer un ventilateur de 120mm à l'arrière du boitier, un peu dommage pour évacuer l'air chaud du gpu...
Gute Verarbeitung, alles im Lieferumfang enthalten.Top!
